directions.step:
Mix the flour, cocoa, baking soda and salt together and then sift the mixture. In a separate bowl mix the water, corn oil vanilla and vinegar or lemon juice. The whisk the wet and dry mixtures together. Pour through a strainer into a clean bowl, breaking up and pressing through any lumps. Mix again and the pour the mixture into a greased 9 x 13 x 2-inch pan. Tap the edge of the pan against the counter or, for more fun but comparable results, drop the entire pan from a height of about 6-inches onto the counter top or the floor a few times to pop and dislodge any air bubbles. Bake at 350 degrees for 25 to 30 minutes.
